nodes.text: The New Jedi Order in 100 Easy Lessons
The New Jedi Order in 100 Easy Lessons is a 10-page reference article appearing in Star Wars Insider 74. It was written by Jason Fry, illustrations by Mike Sutfin.

The article contains a full list of the New Jedi Order novels, tie-in comics and short stories, with Characters Introduced and Key Events explaining specific details along the series. In addition, the article provides many useful summaries and behind the scenes information.
